metadata.name: UltraTag RBC 0 05 mg 9 5mg Kit
metadata.composition: 0 05 mg 9 5mg Technetium Tc 99m red blood cells

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for blood pool imaging including cardiac first pass and gated equilibrium imaging and for detection of sites of gastrointestinal bleeding FDA Label

contraindications.disease: No long term animal studies have been performed to evaluate carcinogenic or mutagenic potential or to determine the effects on male or female fertility FDA Label
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Technetium Tc 99m red blood cells are diagnostic agents that are distributed within the circulation to assess the vascular nature of hemangiomas and diagnosis of venous occlusion A32186 Blood abnormalities can be detected during gamma scintigraphic imaging
